text: Still the King: Celebrating the Music of Bob Wills and His Texas Playboys is a tribute album by American country group Asleep at the Wheel in memory of Bob Wills and the Texas Playboys. It was released in March 2015 under Proper Records. ==Track listing== ==Commercial performance== The album debuted on the Top Country Albums chart at No. 14 and No. 187 on the Billboard 200, selling 3,900 for the week in the US. Figure given here It rose to No. 11 on the Top Country Albums chart in its third week, selling 8,600 in three weeks. Sales figure given here The album has sold 24,600 copies in the US as of August 2015. Sales figure given here ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Chart (2015) ! Peak position |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2015 compilation albums Category:Asleep at the Wheel albums Category:Proper Records compilation albums Category:Bob Wills tribute albums
title: Still the King (album)
